name: MetaBasic
short_description: MetaBasic is a PHP 5.3+ implementation of the metalanguage written as MBML (MetaBasic Markup Language), designed primarily for web development embedded in HTML. The nested MBML tags are interpreted to add language independent scripting to your web pages. See http://www.metabasic.org for more information.
summary: PHP 5.3+ implementation of the MetaBasic Markup Language
